thread.title: Bandai Namco is planning to shut down Rise of Incarnates for good
thread.title_full: Bandai Namco is planning to shut down Rise of Incarnates for good

title: Bandai Namco is planning to shut down Rise of Incarnates for good
text:
Thursday, Oct 15 2015, 01:26 BST Share on Facebook Share on Twitter Share on Google+ It hasn't even been out for a year, but Rise of Incarnates will soon be shut down for good. Bandai Namco has already pulled the free-to-play fighting game from Steam, and it will go offline completely on December 15. 
Â© Namco Bandai Meanwhile, Incarnate Points (IP) are no longer being sold - but players are encouraged to use the ones they own by the termination date."We must regretfully inform all users of the closure of Rise of Incarnates ," the publisher said in a notice on Steam."We offer our sincere thanks to everyone who has supported this game. We will be keeping the servers open until December 15, 2015, so please continue to enjoy Rise of Incarnates until the very end." Rise of Incarnates was released in July on PC . It combines shooting and melee combat in war-ravaged locations such as London, Paris and New York.Check out our most anticipated games of October, one of many videos in Digital Spy 's dedicated Gaming YouTube channel. Be sure to subscribe!
